sentences.sContent: That will allow them to manoeuvre the satellite into the shuttle's cargo bay.
sentences.sCn: 那将使得他们能把人造卫星移入飞船的货物舱。

sentences.sContent: I manoeuvred my way among the tables to the back corner of the place.
sentences.sCn: 我在那些桌子间穿行，来到那地方后面的角落。

words.tran: 可调动的；操纵灵活的；机动的
机动性；可移动；操纵的灵敏性

trans.tranOther: If you manoeuvre something into or out of an awkward position, you skilfully move it there
a skilful or carefully planned action intended to gain an advantage for yourself
